response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the refrigerator. The next step is to open the refrigerator.
response.subtask:
(1) Register the tomato and the refrigerator.
(2) Move the robot to the tomato.
(3) Grasp the tomato.
(4) Move the robot to the refrigerator.
(5) Open the refrigerator.
(6) Put the tomato inside the refrigerator.
(7) Close the refrigerator.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):

    fridge = registry(env, "fridge_xyejdx_0")
    open(robot, fridge)
    donothing(env)
